MyList.title: Know the Prologue
paragraph:
1- Know the Prologue: The game has a prologue that introduces the characters and the story. It is essential to pay attention to the prologue to understand the game's mechanics and the characters' abilities.

 2- Destroy the Locks: The game has locks that prevent you from accessing certain areas. You need to destroy these locks to progress. Look for items that can help you destroy the locks.

 3- Swap Characters with Reckless Abandon: The game has multiple characters, each with unique abilities. It is essential to swap characters frequently to use their abilities to your advantage.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/1.1.png

4-Sell Ingredients: The game has a crafting system that requires ingredients. You can sell the ingredients you don't need to earn money.

 5- Focus on a Single Hero: Early on, the best strategy is to focus on a single hero, making sure they level up quickly to deal big damage. The best heroes for this are those with high attack power.

 -6 Use Rainbow Conchs: Rainbow Conchs are items that can heal your party. Don't sleep on them and use them when needed.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/1.2.png

7- Don't Buy Armor and Weapons Early: It is not necessary to buy armor and weapons early in the game. You can find them as you progress.

 8- Look for Solstice Shrines: Solstice Shrines are hidden throughout the game. They provide a significant boost to your party's stats. Look for them, but don't go out of your way to find them.

 Change Your Brightness Setting: The game's visuals can be overwhelming at times. Adjusting the brightness setting can help you see better.

 10- Use the Wheels: The game has wheels that provide rewards and bonuses. Use them to your advantage.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/1.3.png

MyList.title: how to level up quickly in Sea of Stars
paragraph: 1- Focus on Battles: The best way to gain XP is by fighting enemies and bosses. Try to engage in battles as often as possible.
2- Use Abilities: Each character in Sea of Stars has unique abilities that can help you win battles and gain more XP. Use them to your advantage.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/2.1.png
3- Equip the Right Items: Equipping the right items can boost your characters' stats and help you win battles. Look for items that increase your attack power and defense.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/2.2.png
4- Use Rainbow Conchs: Rainbow Conchs are items that can heal your party and give you a significant boost in XP. Use them when needed.

MyList.title: Here are some of the best ways to earn XP
paragraph: 1- Defeat Enemies and Bosses: The most effective way to earn XP is by defeating enemies and bosses. Engage in battles as often as possible to gain more XP

2- Use Abilities: Each character in Sea of Stars has unique abilities that can help you win battles and gain more XP. Use them to your advantage
3- Equip the Right Items: Equipping the right items can boost your characters' stats and help you win battles. Look for items that increase your attack power and defense
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/3.2.png
4- Use Rainbow Conchs: Rainbow Conchs are items that can heal your party and give you a significant boost in XP. Use them when needed

MyList.title: There is no specific enemy or boss
paragraph: 1- However, defeating enemies and bosses is the most effective way to gain XP
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/4.1.png
2- Early on, it is best to focus on a single hero to level up quickly and deal big damage
3- Equipping the right items and using unique abilities can also help you win battles and gain more XP
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/sea-of-stars/main/4.2.png
4- Additionally, using Rainbow Conchs can heal your party and give you a significant boost in XP
